content: I personally hate weeding tools, there are classes at my university that are meant to do nothing but cut down on the number of students that make it through certain programs. Its not that companies or institutions care about everyone making it through, but whether they have the resources to care for everyone that could possibly make it through. Naturally the underrepresented get lost in a process like this. But hey, you can be that cheerleader for someone now, and so can I.
